modName: LaBeats Immersive and Unique Lens Flare - enb plugin
summary:
Only for users of enb
All the cool lens flare effects you allways wanted in your favorite enb preset, now availabe.
descriptionHtml:
Let´s get straight to the point:


This is a single enb bloom file. Replace it with the bloom file of your enb and BANG! Lens flares happened.

This one features unique lens flare techniques:

Anamorphic lens flare bloom

Anamorphic lens reflection

four lens effects in different colors (subtle colored green, red, blue, and neutral tint)



Allright:
HUD Mods:
minimal Hud
more HUD
A Matter of time

(these mods are not my work and all rights go to their respective owners)


If you want the graphics shown in the screenshots : 
Try out bitterSWEET Advanced Graphics Mod ENB


All you need to know is included in the download.
author: LaBeatBeatbox
